name: Wallace'sKIdsAnimalSounds
0:
”Alexa ask Wallace's Kids what does a cat say”
”what does a monkey say”
”what animal sounds do you make”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wallace's kids
des:
Wallace's Kids makes animal sounds. You can ask Wallace's Kids to speak an animal sound and they will answer you back. Sometimes, Wallace Kids had helpers and they added different animal sounds so try a second time and you may get a different sound or one from a different person.

For example, say "Alexa ask Wallace's Kids what does a cat say?

You can also ask Wallace's Kids to list all the animals they know the sounds of. Just say, "Alexa ask Wallace's Kids what animal sounds can you say?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
